text: hi everyone its Ellen here today I'm
inviting about eight to ten friends over
for dinner so I have to cook something
that looks fancy that can feed everybody
and most importantly that can initiate
communications among the guests but I
don't have my time so it has to be
something easy and quick to put together
the best solution is on ways to prepare
hotpot especially when the weather is
getting cold we cut it low the good
thing about making hotpot is that it's
very flexible there are a lot of
ingredients but they are all not
compulsory so you can adjust to your
budget and preference basically you need
to have five things a soup base some
kind of vegetables some sort of 14
noodles and dipping sauce as long as you
have something to fill out these five
categories you will have a great hot pot
today I decide to make low tide with G's
hot pot with a soup base make with
titanium so it's a very popular hot pot
among the Vietnamese and it's also one
of my favorites
so on the speaking
you
for the vegetable spot you can basically
use anything that you like I like using
corn because it's admin national
sweetness to the soup napa cabbage is
also very popular for hotpot they touch
the leaves rinse well and cut into
2-inch pieces you can do different kinds
of greens like bok choy guilin or
spinach just rinse well and chop them up
for protein part I use a variety of
mushrooms tofu seafood and beef just
break or cut the mushrooms into
bite-sized pieces cut the tofu into
bite-sized cubes
slide the beef thinly against the crane
you can also use chicken instead I also
use white shrimps with trail on just
remove the potty tip of the head the
tails and the legs I also have different
kinds of fish balls make the cross
incisions on the meatballs so that it
will be easier to eat when cooked these
see footballs are very easy to find
frozen an Asian store this is my recipe
for the Tommy I'm dipping sauce 1 TSP
onion paste 2 tbsp soy sauce 2 TSP sugar
1 tsp sesame oil stir well and add some
chopped chilies and sprinkle some sesame
seeds on top it's super tasty and has a
very tempting colour for the soup base I
bought this tom yum set and Asian store
for less than a euro it has all the key
ingredients necessary to make a good -
myung-soo place very convenient and it
also gives you a much better flavor than
just using the Tom Yum paste inside you
have a dozen of red hot peppers a stack
of kaffir lime leaves and this is
galangal a very special root vegetables
that is popular in Asian cuisine and a
few stalks of lemongrass if you use
fresh galangal you can slide into thin
slices like this
you want to cut the lemongrass into two
inch length and cut the hot peppers in
half also tell the lime leaves to
release the fragrance but keep the stems
attached slide onion lengthwise into
thin wedges and cut tomatoes into large
wedges if you don't have much time you
can buy the chicken beef or pork broth
in a can old container at the
supermarket today I use some homemade
pop broth pour it into the hot pot then
add all the ingredients for the soup
base into the pot the lemongrass lime
leaves and galangal gonna release a very
fresh and pleasant aroma to your soup
base to add more colors to the soup base
I add two good teaspoon of Tom Yum paste
the soup should be sour savory and spicy
so you just season to your taste with
salt lime juice and fish sauce that's
all it's time to eat just arrange
everything neatly on different plates
vegetables feed balls to fools different
cut-up sources
this is pin cut which also girls wear
with hot pot you just break it into
smaller pieces and it will soften in the
soup the hot pot is placed at the center
of the dining table everyone helps
themselves placing whatever thing that
they want to eat into the boiling hot
pot I like putting corn in first because
it takes longer to cook and it will also
release the natural sweetness to the
broth for noodles you can use rice
vermicelli glass noodle egg noodles or
even instant noodles mirror to the end
the soup is flavored with all this good
stuff and you can actually layer it into
your serving bowl and have it lion-o
so it's just a profit way to entertain
your friends and yourself too if you
